citation: Proclamation under the Criminal Justice (Mental Impairment) Act 1999 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Criminal Justice (Mental Impairment) Act 1999

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Criminal Justice (Mental Impairment) Act 1999 fix 1 November 1999 as the day on which the provisions of that Act commence.

18 October 1999

G. S. M. GREEN

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

P. J. PATMORE

Minister for Justice and Industrial Relations

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 27 October 1999

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Justice and Industrial Relations.
